alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Marion and south central Putnam Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lynne, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Silver Springs Shores, Welaka, Burbank and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam
